full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Building and Grounds Maintenance Service**
================rename=====================

### Tender Details

**Reference Number**: cb-738-98066192  
**Solicitation ID**: 9F030-23-0321  
**Publication Date**: June 11, 2024  
**Tender Closing Date**: July 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EST  
**Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2024  
**Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2026 (with optional four-year extensions)  

### Tender Overview

The Canadian Space Agency invites proposals from qualified firms to provide building and grounds maintenance services at its John H. Chapman Space Centre, located at 6767 route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, Canada. The successful bidder will be responsible for maintaining the site's buildings and grounds for an initial two-year period, with optional four-year extensions.

### Labour Requirements

The successful bidder is expected to provide:

*   Two (2) full-time Building Maintenance Technicians (40 hours per week, Monday to Friday, 7:00 a.m. to 3:30 p.m.)
*   Two (2) full-time Building and Grounds Maintenance Technicians
*   One (1) full-time Labourer

### Tendering Process

The Canadian Space Agency will award the contract through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process. The RFP document can be found [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/39958/9f030-23-0321---request-for-proposal-\(rfp.pdf\).

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Canadian Space Agency, located at 6767 route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, Canada J3Y 8Y9.

### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries, please contact Mélanie Séguin at melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca or 438-364-1399.
